name: banka
description: Banka is a light-weight core banking application that powers banking operations like account

scripts.start: concurrently "babel-node server/server.js" "npm run create && npm run seed" && npm run client
scripts.server: nodemon --exec babel-node server/server.js && npm run client
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run drop" "npm run create" "npm run seed" "npm run server" "npm run client"
scripts.dev:test: concurrently "npm run drop" && npm run create && npm run seed
scripts.test: NODE_ENV=test npm run dev:test && NODE_ENV=test nyc --reporter=text --reporter=lcov mocha --timeout 1500 --require babel-polyfill --require babel-register server/tests/**/*.test.js --exit

author: Audace Uhiriwe
